*OUTSIDE THE ARK*

Rodimus and Leo II sat there listening as Uproar and Qui=
ckstride relate
their idea about attempting to disrupt the forcefield with =
their bodies
while the rest of the group got through.

Leo II, just shook h=
is head as a small smile sketched itself on his, =93No
lads.=94 He said, hi=
s voice serious, despite the smile, =93There is no reason
for you to sacrif=
ice yourselves like that.=94

Wing Caliber, one of the Maximal tactical spe=
cialists, nodded, =93Besides, if
it were that easy to get in, don=92t you t=
hink Megatron would have sacrificed
a few of his troops to get through year=
s ago before this Hydras showed up?=94

Rodimus smiled at Leo II and Wing C=
aliber thankful for their input, =93They
are right. No we need you two here=
 with us.=94

Rodimus paused as he got a call . . .

> Perceptor opened his=
 comlink to Rodimus and said "Less than 2 mins...
> Nightlight is free; we =
will sedate her, I have an idea to see if
> reprogramation actually worked,=
 but i need you here"

=93I read you.=94 He said as he looked back at the o=
thers, holding up his hand,
it would soon be time. Rodimus glanced at the A=
rk, =93Just a little bit more.=94
He said as he held out his signature scra=
mbling device, ready to use it.

Leo II, Wing Caliber and Ramulus tensed up=
, ready to dash when Rodimus gave
the signal.


*INSIDE THE ARK*

As Percep=
tor communicated with Rodimus on the outside, Legacy, Bump and
Santon conti=
nued to oversee the reboot of Nightlight, Bump and Santon giving
a visible =
sight of relief as her systems were beginning to come up.

Legacy carefully=
 positioned a device over Nightlight=92s chest and delivered a
sedative, on=
e that would keep her systems stable but would also keep her
unconscious.

=
Santon glanced over at Perceptor and then back at Nightlight, shaking his
h=
ead, obviously uncomfortable about the whole thing, saving Nightlight by
wo=
rking with the very being who had subjected her to this in the first
place.=
 However for the moment he was content to let things lie.

Meanwhile, elsew=
here in the Ark,

=93Elita! Elita!=94 Lord Elder=92s voice could be heard n=
ear by. Even though he
was whispering as loud as he could, his voice sounde=
d weak as the sounds of
a shuffled movement could be heard in the darkness =
of Elita=92s room.

=93Elita . . . =93 Elder=92s voice sounded as if it wer=
e getting further away.

*OUTSIDE THE TOWER*

> Hydras started to move away=
, trying reach a safe distance; while he was
> doing that he open com link =
with all Predacons and said "TO ALL
> PREDACONS LEAVE THE BLACKFORTRESS and=
 sorrounding area,
> NOW... FOLLOW MY SIGNAL!!!!!"

As Hydras gives the ord=
er the other Predacons transform into to Beast Mode
to make their get away,=
 the vast majority of them taking to the air! The
large door on the black T=
ower opens as Scourge and Cyclonus fly out, both of
them already in their a=
erial modes, boosters flaring as they hit the skies!

However as they fly t=
hey can almost immediately make out the form of
Windlord as he carried Rat =
Trap in his claws, the duo began to change their
vector of flight, angling =
towards them.

=93Sir.=94 Cyclonus transmited over his radio to Hydras, =93=
The Maximals that
attempted to break into the Fortress are trying to make t=
heir get away as
well. Shall we terminate them?=94

They began to fly after=
 Windlord, their superior speed in the air making it
easy for them to begin=
 to close the distance between them, rocket and
missile launchers beginning=
 to glow as they targeted the flying Maximals.

Meanwhile on the ground,

T=
orca nodded as Hydras and the other Predacons began to back off. =93We Fuzo=
rs
don=92t have wheels and drive.=94 He said to Nightshift as looked around=
 and
then glanced back at Tuscon in vehicular mode. =93But let=92s see what=
 we can
do.=94

=93BANTOR!=94 Torca called out, =93Beast Mode!=94

The Maxi=
mal in question quickly transformed into the somewhat bizzar
alternate mode=
, becoming a cross between a baboon and a Tiger; looking
strong and powerfu=
l, even if unconventional.

With that Torca transformed into his beastmode =
as well, that of an elephant
and a Killer whale. He along with Bantor posit=
ioned themselves to the front
of Tuscon. =93We won=92t be the fastest thing=
s, but we can get you home.=94 Torca
said as he waited to pull.

Above thei=
r heads Noctorro, Air Hammer and Silverbolt take to the skies,
becoming an =
aerial escort to the injured Maximals and Autobots!

(TAG)

Preston

--90e6ba53b506f881c3049bca7746
